content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I asked the AI to Google productive things to do and found a website with a list of over 100 ideas. I then asked the AI to browse the website for more information, where I learned about the importance of rest and relaxation, trying new things, and self-improvement. The website also had an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule. I saved this information to a file called "productive_things_to_do.txt" and received confirmation that the file was written successfully. The website also promoted a free time tracking software called Clockify.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "eisenhower_box_notes.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The Eisenhower Box strategy is a productivity tool that helps you prioritize tasks by dividing them into four categories:\n\n1. Urgent and important\n2. Important but not urgent\n3. Urgent but not important\n4. Neither urgent nor important\n\nBy categorizing tasks in this way, you can focus on what's important and avoid wasting time on tasks that are neither urgent nor important.", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "interesting and productive things to do"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://clockify.me/blog/managing-time/productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "https://www.familysearch.org/en/blog/productive-things-to-do-at-home", "https://www.ntaskmanager.com/blog/productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "https://toggl.com/blog/50-productive-things-to-do-at-work-when-youre-bored-silly", "https://rize.io/blog/22-productive-things-to-do-when-bored", "https://clickup.com/blog/productive-things-to-do/", "https://www.shinesheets.com/99-productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "https://juliety.com/productive-things-to-do-at-home"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://clockify.me/blog/managing-time/productive-things-to-do-when-bored/", "question": "What are some interesting and productive things to do?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.\n\nLinks: ['\\n\\n\\n\\n\\n (https://clockify.me/)', '\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\tBlog\\n\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t\\t (https://clockify.me/blog/)', 'Tracking time (https://clockify.me/blog/./tracking-time/)', 'Managing time  (https://clockify.me/blog/./managing-time/)', 'Productivity (https://clockify.me/blog/./productivity/)']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt", "text": "The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin\'s daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command read_file returned: The website I found provides a list of over 100 productive things to do when bored, emphasizing the importance of rest and relaxation, and encouraging readers to try new things and improve themselves. It also includes an article on overcoming the planning fallacy and a personal account of following Benjamin Franklin's daily schedule, as well as promoting a free time tracking software called Clockify.", type='action_result')]
"""
